wordGroup: downside risk 跌价风险；下跌风险
on the downside 下降中，衰落中，衰减中

sentences.en: The downside of this approach is a lack of clear leadership.
sentences.cn: 这种方式的不足之处是缺乏明确的指挥。

sentences.en: Encouraging this kind of thinking has a downside.
sentences.cn: 鼓励这种想法有个缺点。

sentences.en: Even so, kings and queens undoubtedly have a downside.
sentences.cn: 即便如此，国王和王后无疑也有缺点。
